title: I cant buy the nice try emote :(

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to simplify how you share and bookmark today.

body: I got this error 5 times in a row when trying to buy the nice try emote. I only got it on that specific emote and tried restarting my router and the client. Still isnt working :(
